channel.title: Hello, World :: CIS 308 Textbook
channel.description: The first program students write in any new language is the “Hello, World” program. Here’s how it looks in C: #include <stdio.h> int main() { printf("Hello, World!\n"); return 0; } To write and run this program see the Tools Guide in section 0.1 for more information. It should print “Hello, World!” to the console.
